mav_sim.message_types.msg_path module¶

msg_path: messages type for input to path follower.

part of mavsim_python

  • Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Last update:

    3/11/2019 - RWB 12/2021 - GND

class mav_sim.message_types.msg_path.MsgPath(type: Literal['line', 'orbit'] = 'line', plot_updated: bool = False, airspeed: float = 25.0, line_origin: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]] = array([[0.], [0.], [0.]]), line_direction: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]] = array([[1.], [0.], [0.]]), orbit_center: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]] = array([[0.], [0.], [0.]]), orbit_radius: float = 50.0, orbit_direction: Literal['CW', 'CCW'] = 'CW')¶
